EmailTemplate.name: Updating Regulatory Agency Directory Information
EmailTemplate.subject: Updating Regulatory Agency Directory Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
How to Update Regulatory Agency Directory Information
Sign-in to CERS Regulator. Select the “Regulators” button from the menu bar. (Located at the top of each page.) Select regulatory agency. Select the “Directory Info” link. (Located on the left-hand side of the Regulator “Summary” page.) Select the “Edit” button. (Located at the bottom of the “Directory Info” page.) Make the necessary change(s), then select the “Save” button to update regulatory agency directory information, in CERS.
